verses.text: The word that came to Jeremiah from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, saying ,

Stand in the gate of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* house , and proclaim there this word , and say , Hear the word of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, all \add ye of\add* Judah , that enter in at these gates to worship the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel , Amend your ways and your doings , and I will cause you to dwell in this place.

Trust ye not in lying words , saying , The temple of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, The temple of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, The temple of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add are\add* these.
For if ye throughly amend your ways and your doings ; if ye throughly execute judgment between a man and his neighbour ;
\add If\add* ye oppress not the stranger , the fatherless , and the widow , and shed not innocent blood in this place , neither walk after other gods to your hurt :
Then will I cause you to dwell in this place , in the land that I gave to your fathers , for ever and ever. \p
¶ Behold, ye trust in lying words , that cannot profit.
Will ye steal , murder , and commit adultery , and swear falsely , and burn incense unto Baal , and walk after other gods whom ye know not;
And come and stand before me in this house , which is called by my name , and say , We are delivered to do all these abominations ?\f + \fr 7.10 \ft which…: Heb. whereupon my name is called\f*
Is this house , which is called by my name , become a den of robbers in your eyes ? Behold, even I have seen \add it\add*, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
But go ye now unto my place which \add was\add* in Shiloh , where I set my name at the first , and see what I did to it for the wickedness of my people Israel.

And now, because ye have done all these works , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and I spake unto you, rising up early and speaking , but ye heard not; and I called you, but ye answered not;
Therefore will I do unto \add this\add* house , which is called by my name , wherein ye trust , and unto the place which I gave to you and to your fathers , as I have done to Shiloh.
And I will cast you out of my sight , as I have cast out all your brethren , \add even\add* the whole seed of Ephraim. \p
Therefore pray not thou for this people , neither lift up cry nor prayer for them , neither make intercession to me: for I will not hear thee. \p
¶ Seest thou not what they do in the cities of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem ?

The children gather wood , and the fathers kindle the fire , and the women knead \add their\add* dough , to make cakes to the queen of heaven , and to pour out drink offerings unto other gods , that they may provoke me to anger.\f + \fr 7.18 \ft queen…: or, frame, or, workmanship of heaven\f*
Do they provoke me to anger ? saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \add do they\add* not \add provoke\add* themselves to the confusion of their own faces ?

Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, mine anger and my fury shall be poured out upon this place , upon man , and upon beast , and upon the trees of the field , and upon the fruit of the ground ; and it shall burn , and shall not be quenched. \p
¶ Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel ; Put your burnt offerings unto your sacrifices , and eat flesh.

For I spake not unto your fathers , nor commanded them in the day that I brought them out of the land of Egypt , concerning burnt offerings or sacrifices :\f + \fr 7.22 \ft concerning: Heb. concerning the matter of\f*
But this thing commanded I them, saying , Obey my voice , and I will be your God , and ye shall be my people : and walk ye in all the ways that I have commanded you, that it may be well unto you.

But they hearkened not, nor inclined their ear , but walked in the counsels \add and\add* in the imagination of their evil heart , and went backward , and not forward.\f + \fr 7.24 \ft imagination: or, stubbornness\f*\f + \fr 7.24 \ft went: Heb. were\f*
Since the day that your fathers came forth out of the land of Egypt unto this day I have even sent unto you all my servants the prophets , daily rising up early and sending \add them:\add*
Yet they hearkened not unto me, nor inclined their ear , but hardened their neck : they did worse than their fathers.
Therefore thou shalt speak all these words unto them; but they will not hearken to thee: thou shalt also call unto them; but they will not answer thee.

But thou shalt say unto them, This \add is\add* a nation that obeyeth not the voice of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their God , nor receiveth correction : truth is perished , and is cut off from their mouth.\f + \fr 7.28 \ft correction: or, instruction\f* \p

¶ Cut off thine hair , \add O Jerusalem\add*, and cast \add it\add* away , and take up a lamentation on high places ; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath rejected and forsaken the generation of his wrath.
For the children of Judah have done evil in my sight , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: they have set their abominations in the house which is called by my name , to pollute it.

And they have built the high places of Tophet , which \add is\add* in the valley of the son of Hinnom , to burn their sons and their daughters in the fire ; which I commanded \add them\add* not, neither came it into my heart.\f + \fr 7.31 \ft came…: Heb. came it upon my heart\f* \p

¶ Therefore, behold, the days come , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that it shall no more be called Tophet , nor the valley of the son of Hinnom , but the valley of slaughter : for they shall bury in Tophet , till there be no place.
And the carcases of this people shall be meat for the fowls of the heaven , and for the beasts of the earth ; and none shall fray \add them\add* away.

Then will I cause to cease from the cities of Judah , and from the streets of Jerusalem , the voice of mirth , and the voice of gladness , the voice of the bridegroom , and the voice of the bride : for the land shall be desolate.
